edu.umass.cs.gnsserver.activecode.prototype

Class ActiveQueryHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.gnsserver.activecode.prototype.ActiveQueryHandler

  • public class ActiveQueryHandler
extends Object
    This class is used for executing the queries sent from ActiveWorker and sending response back.
    Author:
    gaozy
